thread.section_title: OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OCEANE Body.Mind.Soul | oceanebeauty.com
thread.title: Renee

author: Renee
title: Renee
text: My sincere thanks for the excellent customer service provided by Lea Rosby, Customer Service Manager. I had the opportunity to meet a beautiful customer service agent at a Christmas Expo. She approached me and noticed the puffy eyes and bags under my eyes. After the demo using Oceane Turquoise Pearl Instant Mask, I was sold!! Transformed in 2 minutes,a Miracle!! I also bought the Blue Pearl Eye serum. To my dismay, I ran out of my secret miracle face lift mask, I spoke to Lea and my Instant Facelift Mask was shipped immediately!! Amazing!! That is customer service and a pleasing experience. Look no further for products promising results. I stand by these products, I will continue to replenish my MIRACLE products. I looked years younger in minutes. In order to feel good about ourselves, it starts on the inside,and thanks to Oceane your beauty will be represented on the outside!! Renee Valentine
